data.title: Premier League Articles
data.text:
Chelsea 0-2 Manchester City Stats: City Begin Title Defence With Victory in London

Reigning champions Man City get their 2024-25 Premier League season off to a winning start in London. Check out the best facts, stats and Opta data from Sunday's game at…

Leicester City vs Tottenham Prediction: Premier League Match Preview

We look ahead to Monday's Premier League game at the King Power Stadium with our Leicester City vs Tottenham prediction and preview. Read on for all the key insights.

The Players with the Most Premier League Appearances

We look at the top 20 players to have made the most Premier League appearances. Can James Milner go on and break the competition record?

The Premier League’s All-Time Leading Goalscorers

It's a record that hasn't changed hands since December 1993; these are the Premier League's all-time leading goalscorers...

Chelsea vs Manchester City Prediction: Premier League Match Preview

We look ahead to Sunday's headline Premier League fixture with our Chelsea vs Manchester City prediction and preview.

West Ham 1-2 Aston Villa Stats: Duran Comes off the Bench to Win It for Villa

Aston Villa get their 2024-25 Premier League campaign under way with an away win. Check out the best facts, stats and Opta data from Saturday's game at the London Stadium…

Arsenal 2-0 Wolves Stats: Havertz and Saka Guide Gunners to Opening Win

Arsenal secured three points on the opening weekend of the 2024-25 Premier League season. Check out the best facts, stats and Opta data from Saturday's game at the Emirates Stadium…

The Youngest Premier League Managers

Who is the youngest Premier League manager of all time? We give a run down of the top 10 youngest to take charge of a match in the competition.

Ipswich 0-2 Liverpool Stats: Jota and Salah the Perfect Duet for Slot’s Men

Diogo Jota and Mohamed Salah struck to give Arne Slot a win in his first Premier League game. Check out the best facts, stats and Opta data from Saturday's game…
